DOC.brief_summary: This two-part , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study VTP-43742 administer normal healthy volunteer ( NHV ) moderate severe psoriatic patient , sequential ascend dose panel .
DOC.brief_title: An Ascending Multiple Dose Study With VTP-43742 Healthy Volunteers Psoriatic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , ascend multiple dose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics effect VTP-43742 healthy volunteer conduct single , study center patient moderate severe chronic plaque-type psoriasis approximately 8 study center United States . A total 108 participant enrol study ( 48 healthy subject 60 psoriatic patient ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteer Healthy male female , 18 45 year age , inclusive . Body weight least 55 kg body mass index 1832 kg/m2 , inclusive . Medically healthy clinically insignificant screen result . Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) may enrol agree use two reliable form contraception Men partner WOCBP must agree and/or partner use two reliable form contraception WOCBP must negative serum βhCG pregnancy test Checkin visit .
